issue.title: Resource list fails to show if a state contains a quote.
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Resources metadatastate is not escaped in resources.js.php.
Resource list fails to show if a state contains a quote.

```

resource.version(200043, 200043, 'version-name-auto-generated', 3, 'En cours d'édition', '2012-08-24 00:00:00');
        resources.add(resource);
```


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Version name should not contain quote since it is auto-generated. Only the metadatastate string is problematic.

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

All good, thank you !
